mods.abstract: Part 2 of the January 6, 1945 broadcast of the Carolina Hayride originating from WBT, Charlotte, NC; as recorded by a San Francisco radio station. Featuring announcer Howard Turner, master of ceremonies and producer 'Charlie Briarhopper' (Charles Crutchfield), and performers Fred Kirby, the Briarhoppers (including Hank Warren and 'Big' Bill Davis), the Southland Jubilee Singers (including Oscar Broadway), Arthur "Guitar Boogie" Smith (very likely, unconfirmed), and the Tennessee Ramblers.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
recordInfo.recordOrigin: Record has been transformed into MODS v3.5 from a Qualified Dublin Core record by the Digital Library of Tennessee, a service hub of the Digital Public Library of America.
